trans-unit.source: Identify the company’s business needs that will lead you to define the requirements for the hybrid identity design.
trans-unit.target: Identify the company’s business needs that will lead you to define the requirements for the hybrid identity design.

trans-unit.source: Determine identity requirements for your hybrid identity solution
trans-unit.target: Determine identity requirements for your hybrid identity solution

trans-unit.source: The first step in designing a hybrid identity solution is to determine the requirements for the business organization that will be leveraging this solution.
trans-unit.target: The first step in designing a hybrid identity solution is to determine the requirements for the business organization that will be leveraging this solution.

trans-unit.source: Hybrid identity starts as a supporting role (it supports all other cloud solutions by providing authentication) and goes on to provide new and interesting capabilities that unlock new workloads for users.
trans-unit.target: Hybrid identity starts as a supporting role (it supports all other cloud solutions by providing authentication) and goes on to provide new and interesting capabilities that unlock new workloads for users.

trans-unit.source: These workloads or services that you wish to adopt for your users will dictate the requirements for the hybrid identity design.
trans-unit.target: These workloads or services that you wish to adopt for your users will dictate the requirements for the hybrid identity design.

trans-unit.source: These services and workloads need to leverage hybrid identity both on-premises and in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: These services and workloads need to leverage hybrid identity both on-premises and in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: You need to go over these key aspects of the business to understand what it is a requirement now and what the company plans for the future.
trans-unit.target: You need to go over these key aspects of the business to understand what it is a requirement now and what the company plans for the future.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have the visibility of the long term strategy for hybrid identity design, chances are that your solution will not be scalable as the business needs grow and change.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have the visibility of the long term strategy for hybrid identity design, chances are that your solution will not be scalable as the business needs grow and change.

trans-unit.source: Determine business needs
trans-unit.target: Determine business needs

trans-unit.source: Each company will have different requirements, even if these companies are part of the same industry, the real business requirements might vary.
trans-unit.target: Each company will have different requirements, even if these companies are part of the same industry, the real business requirements might vary.

trans-unit.source: You can still leverage best practices from the industry, but ultimately it is the company’s business needs that will lead you to define the requirements for the hybrid identity design.
trans-unit.target: You can still leverage best practices from the industry, but ultimately it is the company’s business needs that will lead you to define the requirements for the hybrid identity design.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to answer the following questions to identify your business needs:
trans-unit.target: Make sure to answer the following questions to identify your business needs:

trans-unit.source: Is your company looking to cut IT operational cost?
trans-unit.target: Is your company looking to cut IT operational cost?

trans-unit.source: Is your company looking to secure cloud assets (SaaS apps, infrastructure)?
trans-unit.target: Is your company looking to secure cloud assets (SaaS apps, infrastructure)?

trans-unit.source: Is your company looking to modernize your IT?
trans-unit.target: Is your company looking to modernize your IT?

trans-unit.source: Are your users more mobile and demanding IT to create exceptions into your DMZ to allow different type of traffic to access different resources?
trans-unit.target: Are your users more mobile and demanding IT to create exceptions into your DMZ to allow different type of traffic to access different resources?

trans-unit.source: Does your company have legacy apps that needed to be published to these modern users but are not easy to rewrite?
trans-unit.target: Does your company have legacy apps that needed to be published to these modern users but are not easy to rewrite?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to accomplish all these tasks and bring it under control at the same time?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to accomplish all these tasks and bring it under control at the same time?

trans-unit.source: Is your company looking to secure users’ identities and reduce risk by bringing new tools that leverage the expertise of Microsoft’s Azure security expertise on-premises?
trans-unit.target: Is your company looking to secure users’ identities and reduce risk by bringing new tools that leverage the expertise of Microsoft’s Azure security expertise on-premises?

trans-unit.source: Is your company trying to get rid of the dreaded “external” accounts on premises and move them to the cloud where they are no longer a dormant threat inside your on-premises environment?
trans-unit.target: Is your company trying to get rid of the dreaded “external” accounts on premises and move them to the cloud where they are no longer a dormant threat inside your on-premises environment?

trans-unit.source: Analyze on-premises identity infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Analyze on-premises identity infrastructure

trans-unit.source: Now that you have an idea regarding your company business requirements, you need to evaluate your on-premises identity infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have an idea regarding your company business requirements, you need to evaluate your on-premises identity infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: This evaluation is important for defining the technical requirements to integrate your current identity solution to the cloud identity management system.
trans-unit.target: This evaluation is important for defining the technical requirements to integrate your current identity solution to the cloud identity management system.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to answer the following questions:
trans-unit.target: Make sure to answer the following questions:

trans-unit.source: What authentication and authorization solution does your company use on-premises?
trans-unit.target: What authentication and authorization solution does your company use on-premises?

trans-unit.source: Does your company currently have any on-premises synchronization services?
trans-unit.target: Does your company currently have any on-premises synchronization services?

trans-unit.source: Does your company use any third-party Identity Providers (IdP)?
trans-unit.target: Does your company use any third-party Identity Providers (IdP)?

trans-unit.source: You also need to be aware of the cloud services that your company might have.
trans-unit.target: You also need to be aware of the cloud services that your company might have.

trans-unit.source: Performing an assessment to understand the current integration with SaaS, IaaS or PaaS models in your environment is very important.
trans-unit.target: Performing an assessment to understand the current integration with SaaS, IaaS or PaaS models in your environment is very important.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to answer the following questions during this assessment:
trans-unit.target: Make sure to answer the following questions during this assessment:

trans-unit.source: Does your company have any integration with a cloud service provider?
trans-unit.target: Does your company have any integration with a cloud service provider?

trans-unit.source: If yes, which services are being used?
trans-unit.target: If yes, which services are being used?

trans-unit.source: Is this integration currently in production or is it a pilot?
trans-unit.target: Is this integration currently in production or is it a pilot?

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have an accurate mapping of all your apps and cloud services, you can use the Cloud App Discovery tool.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have an accurate mapping of all your apps and cloud services, you can use the Cloud App Discovery tool.

trans-unit.source: This tool can provide your IT department with visibility into all your organization’s business and consumer cloud apps.
trans-unit.target: This tool can provide your IT department with visibility into all your organization’s business and consumer cloud apps.

trans-unit.source: That makes it easier than ever to discover shadow IT in your organization, including details on usage patterns and any users accessing your cloud applications.
trans-unit.target: That makes it easier than ever to discover shadow IT in your organization, including details on usage patterns and any users accessing your cloud applications.

trans-unit.source: To access this tool go to [https://appdiscovery.azure.com](https://appdiscovery.azure.com/)
trans-unit.target: To access this tool go to [https://appdiscovery.azure.com](https://appdiscovery.azure.com/)
